Koden Koureijutsu: Hyaku Monogatar: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi
name: Koden Koureijutsu Hyaku Monogatari: Hontoni Atta Kowai Hanashi
overview: Koden Koureijutsu Hyaku Monogatari: Hontoni Atta Kowai Hanashi (古伝降霊術 百物語 ～ほんとにあった怖い話～) is a adventure game for the Sega Saturn.
